---
id: s-2-s-disconnect-user
title: "Disconnect User"
description: "Disconnect a mod.io user from a linked studio user. This will completely remove the SSO connection between the mod.io user and the external user."

hide_title: true

sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Disconnect User"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/s2s/connections/{portal-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Disconnect a mod.io user from a linked studio user. This will completely remove the SSO connection between the mod.io user and the external user.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"portal-id","in":"path","description":"ID of the user stored in the studio system","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Successful or Unsuccessful Request. No Body Returned.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"204","type":"object","default":"204 No Content"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
